background: Ayse mixes two fertilizers, C and Y, to produce a plant growth compound which must meet certain nitrous oxide and vitamin mix requirements.
constraints: The compound must contain at least MinNitrous units of nitrous oxide
The compound must contain at least MinVitamin units of vitamin mix
The amount of fertilizer C used is non-negative
The amount of fertilizer Y used is non-negative
objective: Minimize the cost of Ayse's compound
description: Ayse produces a plant growth compound by mixing two types of fertilizer: C and Y. This growth compound must contain at least \var{MinNitrous} units of nitrous oxide and \var{MinVitamin} units of vitamin mix. Fertilizer C and Y cost \var{CostC} and \var{CostY} per kg respectively. Fertilizer C contains \var{NitrousC} units of nitrous oxide per kg and \var{VitaminC} units of vitamin mix per kg. Fertilizer Y contains \var{NitrousY} units of nitrous oxide per kg and \var{VitaminY} unit of vitamin mix per kg. Determine the minimum cost of Ayse's compound.

parameters.definition: Cost of fertilizer C per kg
Cost of fertilizer Y per kg
Amount of nitrous oxide per kg in fertilizer C
Amount of vitamin mix per kg in fertilizer C
Amount of nitrous oxide per kg in fertilizer Y
Amount of vitamin mix per kg in fertilizer Y
Minimum required units of nitrous oxide in the growth compound
Minimum required units of vitamin mix in the growth compound
